name: Raisin Oatmeal Cookies
author: Anna Marie Burger
instructions:
Sift dry ingredients into bowl. Add shortening, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla. Beat until smooth about 2 minutes. Stir in quick oats and raisins. Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350Â°.
I usually soak the raisins in a little warm water while getting the ingredients together. I make powdered sugar icing and dribble it on the cookies when I take them out of the oven.
